h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Immortal Blessing Gourd location
content: The Immortal Blessing Gourd can be bought from the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain from the start of Chapter 5 onwards. You will need to obtain the Buddha's Right Hand material) from the boss of the same name in The Webbed Hollow, as well as the Buddha's Left Hand from Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw in The Webbed Hollow's Lower Hollow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Immortal_Blessing_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Immortal Blessing Gourd', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Immortal Blessing Gourd location'.
The content is as follows:
The Immortal Blessing Gourd can be bought from the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain from the start of Chapter 5 onwards. You will need to obtain the Buddha's Right Hand material) from the boss of the same name in The Webbed Hollow, as well as the Buddha's Left Hand from Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw in The Webbed Hollow's Lower Hollow.
